job.title: Machine Learning Engineer (Kubernetes, Workflow, Python, AWS)
job.description: pGreetings from PhotonppnbspppWe have an opportunity for anbspstrongMachine Learning Engineer  Kubernetes Workflow Python AWSstrongnbspwith one of our direct clientsppbrppRole is Remote to start but eventually onsite in RichmondVAppbrppstrongWho are WestrongppFor the past 20 years we have powered many Digital Experiences for the Fortune 500 for example if you bank with Chase or Citi you are likely to use what we have built for them Since 1999 we have grown from a few people to more than 4000 team members across the globe that are engaged in various Digital Modernization For a brief 1 minute video about us you can checknbspuhttpsyoutubeuJWBWQZEA6ouppnbspppstrongWhat we are looking forstrongppbrppKubernetesnbspppnbsp Workflow one of these Kubeflow Prefect Airflowppnbsp Pythonppnbsp Microservice architectureppnbsp CICDppnbsp Preferably some exposure to a Cloud provider like AWSp
